docs.snippet: The railway situation in the Southwest is a subject of acute interest in Wall Street at present. Advices as to the earning capacity of the roads doing business in this territory are of the most encouraging sort.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 25. -- During the national fete which was held here to-day President J. Idiarte Borda was shot and killed by an assassin.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 25. -- During the national fete which was held here to-day President J. Idiarte Borda was shot and killed by an assassin.

headline.main: PRESIDENT BORDA KILLED; The Chief Executive of Uruguay Assassinated on the Country's Anniversary. THIRD ATTEMPT SUCCESSFUL The Crime Committed as the President Was Leaving the Cathedral, Where a Te Deum Had Been Sung -- The Assassin Caught.
BORDA'S HONESTY DOUBTED.; His Death Regarded as a Good Thing for Uruguay in Some Quarters.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 26. -- Minister Stuart at Montevideo has cabled to the State Department an official announcement of the assassination of President Borda of Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 26. -- Minister Stuart at Montevideo has cabled to the State Department an official announcement of the assassination of President Borda of Uruguay.

headline.main: REIGN OF TERROR IN URUGUAY.; Mr. Sherman Directs Minister Stuart to Express Abhorrence at the President's Assassination.

docs.snippet: The railway returns for the United Kingdom relative to 1896, prepared by the Commercial Labor and Statistical Department of the Board of Trade, were issued the other day as a blue book, with summary tables for each year commencing with 1854. The...
docs.lead_paragraph: The railway returns for the United Kingdom relative to 1896, prepared by the Commercial Labor and Statistical Department of the Board of Trade, were issued the other day as a blue book, with summary tables for each year commencing with 1854. The total number of miles of railway open at the close of last year was 21,277.
